      • makeAuthenticatedConnection

        public static AtakAuthenticationHandlerHTTP.Connection makeAuthenticatedConnection​(java.net.HttpURLConnection conn,
                                                                                   int loginAttempts)
                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Started an authenticated connection with a provided connection
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection to use
        loginAttempts - the number of login attempts
        Returns:
        the connection which is valid and authenticated
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an exception if the connection could not be authenticated

      • makeAuthenticatedConnection

        public static AtakAuthenticationHandlerHTTP.Connection makeAuthenticatedConnection​(java.net.HttpURLConnection conn,
                                                                                   int loginAttempts,
                                                                                   boolean ignorePreviousFail)
                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • makeAuthenticatedConnection

        public static AtakAuthenticationHandlerHTTP.Connection makeAuthenticatedConnection​(java.net.HttpURLConnection conn,
                                                                                   int loginAttempts,
                                                                                   boolean ignorePreviousFail,
                                                                                   int[] badAccessCodes)
                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Allows for a authenticated connection to be made if the access code returned matches one of the provided access codes in the list.
        Parameters:
        conn - the connection to use to try to make an authenticated connection with. if the connection includes the request-property x-common-site-name, this may be presented to the user to as part of a user experience
        loginAttempts - number of times before giving up.
        ignorePreviousFail - ignore any previous failure attempts
        badAccessCodes - the list of codes that is considered bad access (usually 401 and 403) but can be client supplied
        Returns:
        the working connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection failed to authenticate

      • setAcceptAllVerifier

        protected static void setAcceptAllVerifier​(javax.net.ssl.HttpsURLConnection connection)
                                    throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                           java.security.KeyManagementException
        Overrides the SSL TrustManager and HostnameVerifier to allow all certs and hostnames. WARNING: This should only be used for testing, or in a "safe" (i.e. firewalled) environment.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.KeyManagementException
